## Matrix.multiplyToArray() method

Sets the FloatArray "result" from the given index "offset" with the multiplication of the current matrix and the given one

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
multiplyToArray(other: Readonly<Matrix>, result: FloatArray, offset: number): Matrix;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  other | <code>Readonly&lt;Matrix&gt;</code> | defines the second operand |
|  result | <code>FloatArray</code> | defines the array where to store the multiplication |
|  offset | <code>number</code> | defines the offset in the target array where to start storing values |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Matrix`

the current matrix
